data.event: The history of the town of San Jose dates back to 1601 when this town was a barrio of Lagonoy under the name Danlog.
The construction of the church began in 1818.

event.title: 1813, the town of San Jose was officially established

data.event: In 1813, the town of San Jose was officially established under the name "Patrocinio" derived from the word "Patron", meaning model.
Later in 1883, it was shortened to "San Jose" which is now the official name.
